inputs.description: -dset 1 filename               data set for X observations . . .                           . . .
inputs.name: DSET

inputs.description: -out prefixname                estimated population delta and Wilcoxon signed-rank statistics are written to file prefixname   N.B.: For this program, the user must specify 1 and only 1 sub-brick with each -dset command. That is, if an input dataset contains more than 1 sub-brick, a sub-brick selector must be used, e.g.:
inputs.name: OUT
